inclusion.criterion: Children aged 6 years to 14 years and 10 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Epilepsy patients with drug-resistant focal epilepsy with programmed curative surgical management
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject with IQ greater than 70 (Evaluation of IQ in pre-surgical evaluation)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Antiepileptic drug regimen comprising a benzodiazepine daily
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject beneficiary of French national social security scheme
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Parental (and the child if he or she is of age to do so) have signed the study consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient unable to perform cognitive tests or unwilling to do them
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Planned change in drug regimen before the post-surgical period
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41 year old man with history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
